Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Harold Kimsey Bennett Scholarship
Description:: The Harold Kimsey Bennett Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate merit to be eligible for this award.  Preference is given to residents of Buncombe County, North Carolina.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: William Henry Holderness and William Edward Elmore Scholarship
Description:: The William Henry Holderness and William Edward Elmore Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate sound scholastic record, financial need and public service and community service.  You must also be a resident of North Carolina to be eligible for this renewable award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Mildred M. and William A. Johnson Scholarship
Description:: The Mildred M. and William A. Johnson Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be a North Carolina resident and have exhibited outstanding academic performance to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Sarah Graham Kenan Scholarship
Description:: The Sarah Graham Kenan Scholarship is available to entering students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate merit and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: L.A. Martin Scholarship
Description:: The L.A. Martin Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Nancy K. Rhoden Scholarship
Description:: The Nancy K. Rhoden Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate academic achievement and financial need.  You must also be exhibit an interest in the legal aspects of medicine, bioethics or a related field to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Chief Justice Walter Parker Stacy Scholarship
Description:: The Chief Justice Walter Parker Stacy Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be a resident of North Carolina and have been born in North Carolina to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Professor Lissa Broome Center for Banking and Finance Scholarship
Description:: The Professor Lissa Broome Center for Banking and Finance Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate scholastic, writing ability and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Trey Cheek Memorial Public Interest Scholarship
Description:: The Trey Cheek Memorial Public Interest Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate strong commitment to public interest law and financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 1958 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 1958 Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate merit to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 1963 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 1963 Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 1978 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 1978 Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 1998 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 1998 Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 2002 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 2002 Scholarship is available to entering first-year law students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Class of 2003 Scholarship
Description:: The Class of 2003 Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: William McWhorter Cochrane Scholarship
Description:: The William McWhorter Cochrane Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate achievement, scholastic record, leadership abilities and demonstrated financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Michael A. DeMayo Scholarship
Description:: The Michael A. DeMayo Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate first on need, and second on grades, SAT scores, letter of recommendation, application and a presentation/essay that deals with underage drinking and driving to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Daniel Lyndon and Dawne Talbert Deuterman Scholarship
Description::
The Daniel Lyndon and Dawne Talbert Deuterman Scholarship
 is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be resident of Guilford County, North Carolina, financial need, leadership abilities (demonstrated through co- and extra-curricular activities) and merit to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Kathrine Robinson Everett Scholarship
Description:: The Kathrine Robinson Everett Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate academic merit to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Cecil W. Harrison, Jr., Scholarship
Description:: The Cecil W. Harrison, Jr., Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.  Preference given to students from eastern North Carolina.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Ted Johnson Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Ted Johnson Memorial Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must be married with children to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Professor Martin Louis Scholarship
Description:: The Professor Martin Louis Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate superior merit in the subjects of civil and criminal procedure to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Charles S. Mangum, Sr. and Jr., Scholarship
Description:: The Charles S. Mangum, Sr. and Jr., Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: W. Ellis Meehan Scholarship Fund
Description:: The W. Ellis Meehan Scholarship Fund is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Moore and Van Allen PLLC Chancellors Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Moore and Van Allen PLLC Chancellors Endowed Scholarship is available to students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.  You must demonstrate academic merit to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill School of Law
title: Judge Naomi E. Morris Memorial Scholarship
Description:: The Judge Naomi E. Morris Memorial Scholarship is available to Carolina students at the University of North Carolina, School of Law.
